pages.text: "Not just your everyday alarm... this is an industrial alarm!"$(p)The Industrial Alarm is activated via a redstone signal. Once activated, it will make an obnoxious, stereotypical, annoying alarm blare.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: The Industrial Alarm can be tied to anything that can output a redstone signal. For example, you want to trigger an alarm whenever your $(l:multiblocks/induction_matrix)Induction Matrix$(/l) is full. $(p)To do this, you will need to have a Redstone Comparator next to an $(l:misc_blocks/induction_port)Induction Port$(/l) and make sure that it is measuring the Matrix' capacity. In other words, have the side with two redstone torches be next to the port. $(p)Now place down 15 redstone dusts in between the comparator and the Industrion Alarm, and there you have it. Now when the Matrix is full, the Redstone Comparator will output a redstone signal strength of 15, thus triggering the alarm.
Or you can be a good person and jumpscare your friends with it by having them step on a pressure plate that is connected to an alarm.
